text_importexport_content: Lapha ungangenisa futhi uthumele amabhukumaka akho ngefomethi ye-Netscape.
text_help_content:
Umphathi wamabhukhimakhi uhlelo olusiza ukugcina nokuhlela amabhukumaka e-inthanethi.

Ukwakha ibhukumaka entsha, noma ifolda entsha, cindezela isithonjana se- "plus": khetha phakathi kwebhukhimakhi nefolda, faka i- isihloko bese ekugcineni i-URL, bese ucindezela ukonga ukugcina izinguquko, noma cindezela okuthi susa ukuze ususe ibhukumaka, noma ubuyele emuva ukuze weqe ushintsho kodwa ugcine ibhukumaka.

Cindezela inkinobho "vula" eduze kwebhukhimakhi vula i-URL ehambisanayo. kubo, cindezela inkinobho "hambisa emuva" ukushintshanisa isikhundla nento yangaphambilini, cindezela inkinobho "qhubekela phambili" ukushintshanisa isikhundla nento elandelayo, cindezela inkinobho "yiya phezulu" ukukhipha into kufolda lapho okwamanje, noma cindezela inkinobho "yehla uye phansi" ukuhambisa into ngaphakathi kwifolda elandelayo.

Kumenyu yezilungiselelo, efinyeleleka ngemuva kokuchofoza kusithonjana se- "izilungiselelo", ungafihla noma ubonise izinkinobho zokuhlela, ukunyakaza nokwengeza. Kungenzeka futhi ukuthi ushintshe ulimi lwesixhumi esibonakalayo somsebenzisi.

Ukungenisa noma ukuthekelisa amabhukumaka, cindezela isithonjana sokungenisa / ukuthekelisa. Ifomethi ye-HTML Netscape Bookmarks iyasekelwa, ngakho-ke kungenzeka ukungenisa amabhukumaka akhishwe yiziphequluli ezinkulu zewebhu. Lapho ungenisa amabhukhimakhi asuka efayeleni, amabhukhimakhi akhona manje azosuswa futhi abhalwe phansi.

Imenenja yamabhukhimakhi iyi-Web Progressive Web Application, okusho ukuthi isebenza ngaphakathi kwesiphequluli. Uma uyifaka, ngenkathi izingxenye zesiphequluli zingakhonjiswa, isebenza ngaphakathi kwesiphequluli. Amabhukhimakhi agcinwa endaweni yokugcina yesiphequluli sesizinda samabhukhimakhi.marcoparrone.com i-localStorage isebenza kahle ngeziphequluli ze-Chrome, Edge neFirefox. Ezinye iziphequluli zingasusa isitoreji sendawo ngemuva kwesikhathi esithile. I-Android ngokuzenzakalela isebenzisa i-Chrome, iWindows ngokuzenzakalela isebenzisa i-Edge. Umphathi wamabhukhimakhi okwamanje awasekelwa kumikhiqizo ye-Apple Ngenhloso yokusiza ukuvimbela ukulahleka kwamabhukhimakhi, kuphakanyiswa ukwenza ibhekhaphu usebenzisa ukusebenza "kokuthekelisa", ngaso sonke isikhathi lapho wenza izinguquko ezithile ongafuni ukulahlekelwa zizo.

text_about_content2: LE NKONZO INGAQUKETHA IZINGUQULO EZINIKEZWA NGU-GOOGLE. I-GOOGLE IKHALA IZIMPAWU ZONKE EZIPHATHELENE NEZINULELO, UKUBEKA OKUQUKETHWE NOMA OKUFAKIWE, KUFAKA IZIMPAWU ZONKE ZOKUQINISEKISA, UKUTHEMBEKA, NANOMA YIZO ZONKE IZIMPAWU EZIBALULEKILE ZOKUTHENGISWA, UKULUNGELELWA KWENJONGO ETHILE NOKUNGABONI.
text_about_content3:
Lolu hlelo lokusebenza lwewebhu luhunyushelwe ukuzilungiselela usebenzisa isoftware yokuhumusha enikwa amandla yi-Google Translate. Kwenziwe imizamo enengqondo yokunikeza ukuhumusha okunembile, noma kunjalo, akukho ukuhumusha okuzenzakalelayo okungaphelele futhi akuhloselwe ukufaka esikhundleni sabahumushi abangabantu. Ukuhumusha kunikezwa njengesevisi kubasebenzisi bewebhusayithi ye-marcoparrone.com, futhi kunikezwa "njengoba kunjalo." Ayikho iwaranti yanoma iluphi uhlobo, noma eveziwe noma esetshenzisiwe, enziwa ngokunemba, ukwethembeka, noma ukunemba kwanoma yiziphi izinguqulo ezenziwe ngesiNgisi ziye kolunye ulimi. Okunye okuqukethwe (njengezithombe, amavidiyo, i-Flash, njll.) Kungahle kungatolikwa ngokunembile ngenxa yemikhawulo yesoftware yokuhumusha.

Umbhalo osemthethweni yinguqulo yesiNgisi yewebhusayithi. Noma ikuphi ukungafani noma umehluko owenziwe ekuhumusheni akubophi futhi akunamphumela osemthethweni wokuhambisana noma wokusebenzisa ngenhloso. Uma kuba khona imibuzo ehlobene nokunemba kolwazi oluqukethwe yiwebhusayithi ehunyushiwe, bheka inguqulo yesiNgisi yewebhusayithi okuyiyona esemthethweni.
